name: Social Network
description: Project for learning Angular and practice Spring boot

name: Ticky
description: Small, lightweight Discord bot that helps you create and manage support tickets easily.

name: Web 3 Course Project
description: School project created with four of my friends. The goal was to learn Socket.io and build an application. We decided to create a chat app with features such as group chats and private messaging.

name: The 'Streams' game, recreated for multiplayer.
description: School project developed with three friends as part of a C programming course. The goal was to recreate the game Streams in C, enabling multiplayer gameplay over a network using a server-client architecture with sockets.

name: Project Enterprise Application
description: School project developed with four friends to learn about Enterprise Application Architecture. The goal of the app was to create an internship management system for a school.
